name: We must survive !!
description:
This project for Weekly Game Jam 90: Radioactivity

The survived family from nuclear apocalypse live together in a peaceful house. However, the son has been sick. The father has to find a way to cure his son.

How to play:
Use "a" and "d" to move
"spacebar" to jump
Left click to fire
(Support controller)

Made by Eit_wc and Oyosunan

Music by onderwish
Sound: speedenza, lolamadeus and seansecret
